name: Sarah Johnson
description: Sarah brings extensive experience in K-12 education and tutoring practices. She has worked with school districts across the country to implement effective tutoring programs that improve student outcomes.

name: Michael Chen
description: Michael is a veteran educator with over 20 years of experience in curriculum development and instructional design. He specializes in creating evidence-based tutoring interventions.

name: Emily Rodriguez
description: Emily is a leading practitioner in online tutoring and has developed innovative approaches to remote learning. Her work focuses on equity and access in educational technology.
